subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Cacique continued his emergence as a leader in the turf division Saturday with a one-and-three-quarter-length victory in the $500,000 Man o’ War Stakes at Belmont Park.
snippet: Cacique continued his emergence as a leader in the turf division Saturday with a one-and-three-quarter-length victory in the $500,000 Man o’ War Stakes at Belmont Park.
